articles.title: One list to rule them all
articles.summary: This month, we’re going to explore one of the most powerful forcing functions available to leaders: the single prioritized list. It’s probably the most simple idea you could think of: that your team, department, or company should have one list of priorities, stack ranked from top to bottom, but it’s surprisingly rare to see in […] The post One list to rule them all appeared first on The Engineering Manager.

articles.title: How Codex is built
articles.summary: A deepdive into how OpenAI's Codex team builds its coding agent, how engineers use it, and what it could mean for the future of software engineering. Exclusive
